message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $9,500 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. I'm willing to come down to $11,000. This is still a fair price considering the value of the product.  Let's find a way to make this work.
